name: Angel Investment Network.
tag_list: angel-funding, angel-groups, angel-investing, angel-investment, angel-investment-network, angel-investment-networks, angel-investor, angel-investors, angel-investor-funding, business-angel, business-angels, business-angel-groups, business-angel-funding, b
overview: Angel Investment Network (www.angelinvestmentnetwork.co.uk) is a London-based investment company founded in 2004 whose aim is to connect entrepreneurs and investors. Today we have 30 angel networks worldwide covering over 80 countries. We have over 25,000 investor members and over 150,000 entrepreneurs have signed up to use our services.
